document_data.mainbody:
olym was a cooper and crate maker at Jolyms Barrels & Packing in the city of Loudwater in the Delimbiyr Vale in the mid-to-late 14 to late 15 centuries DR.
From his store circa 1366 DR, Jolym sold barrels, hand kegs, and standard-sized crates. Jolym also manufactured packing crates of custom size or purpose.
In the 1490s DR, the thieves Edgin Darvis, Holga Kilgore, Forge Fitzwilliam, Kira, and Simon Aumar pulled a robbery in Loudwater. The sorcerer Simon tried to cast a spider climb spell but couldnt make it work until Jolym set his dog on him, and then he had no trouble at all.
